text: Avarai nirakarittuvitta avarutaiya makkalil ulla talaivarkal (tamatu makkalukku nuh napiyaic cuttik kanpittu) ivar unkalaip ponra oru manitare tavira verillai. Eninum, avar unkal mitu melana pataviyai vakikkave natukirar. (Meyyakave) allah (nam'mitam oru tutarai anuppa) natiyiruntal vanavarkalaiye anuppivaittiruppan. Munnulla enkal mutataikalitam ittakaiya visayattai nankal kelvippattate illai enrum
